data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 1,216,123 lost in Friuli-Venezia Giulia that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Friuli-Venezia Giulia, Italy
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 17,977 believers living in the state of Friuli-Venezia Giulia. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Friuli-Venezia Giulia, Italy.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Friuli-Venezia Giulia access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the South Asian, general people.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Friuli-Venezia Giulia.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Friuli-Venezia Giulia, Italy who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.section_summary:
the state of Friuli-Venezia Giulia, Italy has a population of 1,234,100.

We estimate Friuli-Venezia Giulia has 17,977 people who might know Jesus, 985,762 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 230,361 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Friuli-Venezia Giulia, Italy, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.
